name: Paris, France
description: Experience the City of Light with its iconic landmarks, world-class cuisine, and romantic atmosphere.

name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Discover the vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and breathtaking views of this iconic Brazilian city.

name: Ottawa, Canada
description: Explore the capital city with its historic parliament buildings and beautiful river views.

name: Tropical Paradise
description: Luxury waterfront properties with palm trees and crystal-clear waters await you.

description: The entertainment capital of the world with world-class shows, dining, and nightlife.

name: Orlando, Florida
description: Theme parks, beautiful lakes, and family-friendly attractions in the Sunshine State.

name: Toronto, Canada
description: Modern skyline with the iconic CN Tower, diverse neighborhoods, and cultural attractions.

name: Fountain City
description: Beautiful cityscape with stunning fountains and modern architecture.
